descriptionHtml:
This mod aims to improve the summon-able Dawnguard horse \'Arvak\' by adding new abilities (lightning, Frost, and Fire Cloak) that activate when in combat. I have also made him permanent (no time limit), but you can use his new scripted toggle summon spell to enable/disable him at will.


*Screen shots were taken using [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24019/?tab=3&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D24019]Arvak Reborn Mod[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23735/?tab=3&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D23735]Arvak with or without flames - color pack[/url].

* Requires Dawnguard.

* Fully compatible with Convenient Horses.


[b]Changes:[/b]

COMPLETELY NEW SCRIPTED VERSION!

1. Added a lightning,fire, and frost cloak effect that activates when the player is in combat.
2. Improve Arvak\'s leveling. He now starts at a minimum of level 4 and will progress with the player.
3. Changed Aravk\'s aggression to fully aggressive, giving him the ability to attack and cause damage with his cloak.
4. New scripted summon toggle spell. Allows you to enable/disable him.


[b]Change Log:[/b]

1.7 - Adjusted cloak damage, modified conditions for Convenient Horses mod (Cloak will now activate if horse is set to \'Friendly Factions\'), Removed \'Summon-able\' tag, which might cause issues with other mods.
1.6 - Fixed double summon spell effect, changed summon from a power back to a spell.
1.5 - Fixed invalid spell summon reference, cleaned junk entries with Tes5Edit.
1.4 - Reduced effect damage, edited summon script.
1.3 - Added scripted version with permanent summon.

[b]Installation: [/b]

1. Use NMM installer.
2. Install manually by adding Arvak (Fire,Frost or Storm).esp to Skyrim/Data folder.
3. Only activate 1 file at a time.


[b]Uninstall:[/b]

1. Deactivate with NMM.
2. Remove Arvak.esp from Skyrim/Data folder.
